mapper.select: select id, good_id, good_inventory_quantity, approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_good2gift where id = #{id}

select id, good_id, good_inventory_quantity, approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_good2gift limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select ggg.*, gg.*, gc.classify_name,gb.brand_name from supplymarketing.gd_good2gift ggg, supplymarketing.gd_goods gg, supplymarketing.gd_classify gc, supplymarketing.gd_brand gb
ggg.good_id = gg.goods_id and gg.goods_classify = gc.classify_id and gg.goods_brand = gb.brand_id
and gg.goods_name like concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
and gc.classify_id like concat(concat('%',#{classifyId}),'%')
and ggg.approval_status like concat(concat('%',#{approvalStatus}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into supplymarketing.gd_good2gift(good_id, good_inventory_quantity, approval_user_id, approval_user_name, approval_time, approval_status, approval_comment, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2) values (#{goodId}, #{goodInventoryQuantity}, #{approvalUserId}, #{approvalUserName}, #{approvalTime}, #{approvalStatus}, #{approvalComment}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark1}, #{remark2})
mapper.update:
update supplymarketing.gd_good2gift
good_id = #{goodId},
good_inventory_quantity = #{goodInventoryQuantity},
approval_user_id = #{approvalUserId},
approval_user_name = #{approvalUserName},
approval_time = #{approvalTime},
approval_status = #{approvalStatus},
approval_comment = #{approvalComment},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
